Label: Selected Reverb
Notes: Display channel name on the switches
Hover help text in the status bar: Reverb Channel Number and Selection.
Keyboard shortcuts: Type �R� to switch to the Reverb Tab. Prompt in the status bar for 5 seconds to type a number and then return to select the corresponding reverb channel.

Label: Reverb Name
Hover help text in the status bar: Displayed Reverb Channel Name (editable).

Label: Attenuation
Hover help text in the status bar: Reverb Channel Attenuation.

Label: Delay/Latency comp.
Notes: Highlight �Latency Compensation� for negative values or �Delay� for positive values
Hover help text in the status bar: Reverb Channel Delay (positive values) or Latency Compensation (negative values).

Label: Position X
Hover help text in the status bar: Reverb Channel Position in Width.
Keyboard shortcuts: Left and Right Arrows to nudge to the left (--) or right (++) in 0.1m increments

Label: Position Y
Hover help text in the status bar: Reverb Channel Position in Depth.
Keyboard shortcuts: Up and Down Arrows to nudge to the upstage (++) or downstage (--) in 0.1m increments

Label: Position Z
Hover help text in the status bar: Reverb Channel Position in Height.
Keyboard shortcuts: Page Up and Page Down to nudge to the up (++) or down (--) in 0.1m increments

Label: Return Offset X
Hover help text in the status bar: Reverb Return Channel Position Offset in Width.
Keyboard shortcuts: Left and Right Arrows to nudge to the left (--) or right (++) in 0.1m increments if holding the [shift] key

Label: Return Offset Y
Hover help text in the status bar: Reverb Return Channel Position Offset in Depth.
Keyboard shortcuts: Up and Down Arrows to nudge to the upstage (++) or downstage (--) in 0.1m increments if holding the [shift] key

Label: Return Offset Z
Hover help text in the status bar: Reverb Return Channel Position Offset in Height.
Keyboard shortcuts: Page Up and Page Down to nudge to the up (++) or down (--) in 0.1m increments if holding the [shift] key

Label: Orientation
Hover help text in the status bar: Reverb Channel Horizontal Orientation (0� means towards the audience in a frontal configuration). (changes may affect the rest of the array)

Label: Angle On
Notes: angleOn+angleOff =< 180; adjust angleOff if angleOn is adjusted and sum is above 180
Hover help text in the status bar: Reverb Channel Will Amplify Objects in this Angle in its Back. (changes may affect the rest of the array)

Label: Angle Off
Notes: angleOn+angleOff =< 180; adjust angleOn if angleOff is adjusted and sum is above 180
Hover help text in the status bar: Reverb Channel Will Not Amplify Objects in this Angle in Front of it. (changes may affect the rest of the array)

Label: Pitch
Hover help text in the status bar: Reverb Channel Vertical Orientation used to Determine which Objects get amplified (changes may affect the rest of the array)

Label: HF Damping
Hover help text in the status bar: Loss of High Frequency Depending on Distance from Object to Reverb. (changes may affect the rest of the array)

Label: Minimum Latency Enable
Hover help text in the status bar: Disables Minimal Latency Mode for Selected Reverb. (changes may affect the rest of the array)

Label: Live Source Attenuation Enable
Hover help text in the status bar: Disables Live Source Attenuation for Selected Reverb. (changes may affect the rest of the array)

Label: Distance Attenuation Percentage
Hover help text in the status bar: Ratio of Distance Attenuation for Selected Reverb. (changes may affect the rest of the array)

Label: EQ Enabled
Hover help text in the status bar: Enable or Disables Equalisation of the Reverb Channel. (changes may affect the rest of the array)

Label: EQ Shape
enum: OFF ; Low Cut ; Low Shelf ; Peak/Notch ; High Shelf ; High Cut
Notes: This setting and the following are present for each 4 EQ band
Hover help text in the status bar: Select the EQ Mode for Band <Band ID> of the Reverb Channel. (changes may affect the rest of the array)

Label: EQ Frequency
Notes: For each 4 EQ band / Greyed out but editable if band mode is set to "OFF"
Hover help text in the status bar: Select the EQ Frequency for Band <Band ID> of the Reverb Channel. (changes may affect the rest of the array)

Label: EQ Gain
Notes: For each 4 EQ band / Greyed out but editable if band mode is set to "OFF"
Hover help text in the status bar: Select the EQ Gain/Attenuation for Band <Band ID> of the Reverb Channel. (changes may affect the rest of the array)

Label: EQ Q
Notes: For each 4 EQ band / Greyed out but editable if band mode is set to "OFF"
Hover help text in the status bar: Select the EQ Q for Band <Band ID> of the Reverb Channel. (changes may affect the rest of the array)

Label: EQ Slope
Notes: For each 4 EQ band / Greyed out but editable if band mode is set to "OFF"
Hover help text in the status bar: Select the EQ Slope for Band <Band ID> of the Reverb Channel. (changes may affect the rest of the array)

Label: Compressor Bypass
Hover help text in the status bar: Enable or disable the pre-compressor for the reverb feed signal.

Label: Compressor Threshold
Hover help text in the status bar: Pre-compressor threshold level (-60 to 0 dB).

Label: Compressor Ratio
Hover help text in the status bar: Pre-compressor ratio (1:1 to 20:1).

Label: Compressor Attack
Hover help text in the status bar: Pre-compressor attack time (0.1 - 100 ms).

Label: Compressor Release
Hover help text in the status bar: Pre-compressor release time (10 - 1000 ms).

Label: Algorithm Type
Hover help text in the status bar: Select the reverb algorithm: SDN (Scattering Delay Network), FDN (Feedback Delay Network), or IR (Impulse Response).

Label: RT60
Hover help text in the status bar: Reverb decay time RT60 (0.2 - 8.0 seconds).

Label: RT60 Low Mult
Hover help text in the status bar: Low frequency RT60 multiplier (0.1 - 9.0x).

Label: RT60 High Mult
Hover help text in the status bar: High frequency RT60 multiplier (0.1 - 9.0x).

Label: Crossover Low
Hover help text in the status bar: Low crossover frequency for 3-band decay (50 - 500 Hz).

Label: Crossover High
Hover help text in the status bar: High crossover frequency for 3-band decay (1 - 10 kHz).

Label: Diffusion
Hover help text in the status bar: Diffusion amount controlling echo density (0 - 100%).

Label: SDN Scale
Hover help text in the status bar: SDN inter-node delay scale factor (0.5 - 4.0x).

Label: FDN Size
Hover help text in the status bar: FDN delay line size multiplier (0.5 - 2.0x).

Label: IR File
Hover help text in the status bar: /wfs/config/reverb/irFile <value>
Keyboard shortcuts: Load an impulse response WAV file for convolution.

Label: IR Trim
Hover help text in the status bar: Trim the start of the impulse response (0 - 100 ms).

Label: IR Length
Hover help text in the status bar: Maximum impulse response length (0.1 - 6.0 seconds).

Label: Per-node IR
enum: Per-node IR OFF; Per-node IR ON
Hover help text in the status bar: Use a separate IR for each reverb node, or share one IR.

Label: Wet Level
Hover help text in the status bar: Wet/dry mix level for reverb output (-60 to +12 dB).

Label: Post EQ Enabled
Hover help text in the status bar: Enable or disable post-processing EQ.

Label: Post EQ Shape
enum: OFF ; Low Cut ; Low Shelf ; Peak/Notch ; High Shelf ; High Cut
Hover help text in the status bar: Post-EQ Band <Band ID> filter shape.

Label: Post EQ Frequency
Hover help text in the status bar: Post-EQ Band <Band ID> frequency (20 Hz - 20 kHz).

Label: Post EQ Gain
Hover help text in the status bar: Post-EQ Band <Band ID> gain (-24 to +24 dB).

Label: Post EQ Q
Hover help text in the status bar: Post-EQ Band <Band ID> Q factor (0.1 - 20.0).

Label: Post EQ Slope
Hover help text in the status bar: Post-EQ Band <Band ID> slope (0.1 - 20.0).

Label: Expander Bypass
Hover help text in the status bar: Enable or disable the post-expander for the reverb return signal.

Label: Expander Threshold
Hover help text in the status bar: Post-expander threshold level (-80 to -10 dB).

Label: Expander Ratio
Hover help text in the status bar: Post-expander ratio (1:1 to 1:8).

Label: Expander Attack
Hover help text in the status bar: Post-expander attack time (0.1 - 50 ms).

Label: Expander Release
Hover help text in the status bar: Post-expander release time (50 - 2000 ms).

Label: Mute Macros
enum: Mute Macro Select�; MUTE ALL�; UNMUTE ALL�; INVERT MUTES�; MUTE ODD�; MUTE EVEN�; MUTE ARRAY 1�; UNMUTE ARRAY 1�; MUTE ARRAY 2�; UNMUTE ARRAY 2�; MUTE ARRAY 3�; UNMUTE ARRAY 3�; MUTE ARRAY 4�; UNMUTE ARRAY 4�; MUTE ARRAY 5�; UNMUTE ARRAY 5�; MUTE ARRAY 6�; UNMUTE ARRAY 6�; MUTE ARRAY 7�; UNMUTE ARRAY 7�; MUTE ARRAY 8�; UNMUTE ARRAY 8�; MUTE ARRAY 9�; UNMUTE ARRAY 9�; MUTE ARRAY 10�; UNMUTE ARRAY 10
Notes: close panel after selection�; temporary switches

Label: Store Reverb Configuration
Notes: Store Reverb Configuration to file (make a back up and show confirmation in status bar)
Hover help text in the status bar: Store Reverb Configuration to file (overwrite with confirmation)

Label: Reload Reverb Configuration
Notes: Reload Reverb Configuration from file (confirmation in status bar)
Hover help text in the status bar: Reload Reverb Configuration from file (with confirmation)

Label: Reload Reverb Config. Backup
Notes: Reload Reverb Configuration from backup file (confirmation in status bar)
Hover help text in the status bar: Reload Reverb Configuration from backup file (with confirmation)

Label: Import Reverb Configuration
Notes: Store Reverb Configuration to file (with file explorer window)
Hover help text in the status bar: Store Reverb Configuration to file (with file explorer window)

Label: Export Reverb Configuration
Notes: Reload Reverb Configuration from file (with file explorer window)
Hover help text in the status bar: Reload Reverb Configuration from file (with file explorer window)

column17: Mute Selectively the Output of an Object to a Speaker.
Mute Macros for Fast Muting and Unmuting of Arrays.
